body_html: @aselle Tensorflow's documentation on distributed computing leads me to believe that the end user is responsible for assigning workers and parameter servers to different devices. Should I then only implement Gradient Descent with Delay Compensation, which the user will have to implement asynchronously?

Should I then only implement Gradient Descent with Delay Compensation, which the user will have to implement asynchronously?
